example.eg: The judge overrode the verdict of the lower court.
example.egtrans: 法官推翻了下级法庭的裁决。

example.eg: The importance of this project overrides any concerns you may have about the costs involved.
example.egtrans: 该项目的重要性将压倒你对所涉及成本可能产生的一切顾虑。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比…重要, 优先于，高于，压倒

example.eg: Press that button to override the system.
example.egtrans: 按下那个按钮以超驰控制系统。

example.eg: The system is functioning automatically; if you need manual control, hit the override.
The judge's override set a new precedent.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 费用增加, 预算增加
